description:
The big sister (ane) of the two maids working for the Demon King and the Hero.
Together with her younger sister she`s been found to be a runaway serf in one of the stables of the country mansion, and instead of being reported given food, new clothes, and jobs as maids in the mansion.
Being a very smart young woman, she is being educated by the Demon King/Crimson Merchant about reading, writing, arithmetics, and the different lives and social classes of human society. She even acts a stand-in for the Demon King, having been given a special ring that can change her appearance.
name: Maid-ane
